title: Zed is technically dead...

embed.description: Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/azoh Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/azoh.lol Twitter: https://twitter.com/Azohwastaken Music: World of Warcraft OST Gardens of Life Dun Morog Elwynn Forest Teldrassil League of Legends preseason is bringing some weird stuff to Zed's kit for some reasoning from Riot that I can't get behind.

body:
Carries are getting stronger and rito still wants to nerf zed :(
The video says it all
All credit goes to Azoh

replies.body:
Do you have any idea how much stronger Zed is now than he was before?

Bork+Old Ghostblade was the worst fucking item path for him, at two items he got 55 AD, he did no burst at all, now he gets 65 from his FIRST item. 

Death's Dance is just straight up perfect for him, even adds a slight touch of tankiness. Black Cleaver was buffed for Assassins as well...

Did I mention these three items alone which are kinda standard on Zed right now, give you max CDR? 

There are so many items that compliment him a shittone.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-12T05:39:55.899+0000)
>
> Do you have any idea how much stronger Zed is now than he was before?
> 
> Bork+Old Ghostblade was the worst fucking item path for him, at two items he got 55 AD, he did no burst at all, now he gets 65 from his FIRST item. 
> 
> Death's Dance is just straight up perfect for him, even adds a slight touch of tankiness. Black Cleaver was buffed for Assassins as well...
> 
> Did I mention these three items alone which are kinda standard on Zed right now, give you max CDR? 
> 
> There are so many items that compliment him a shittone.

His wq combo is dead.
Basically his combo is dead,have you seen how slow his q is right now and patch 5.22 they are planning to make it even more slower wtf
You do realise we're IN 5.22 right? And it's fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T06:19:44.528+0000)
>
> You do realise we're IN 5.22 right? And it's fine.

Yup.made a mistake there but still his poke now is really slow and maybe it's just me but i'm having a hard time adapting to the new zed poke combo
I just played Zed, he is SO much better now with these item paths, his WQ IS slightly harder to aim but it's honestly barely noticeable

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T08:49:43.259+0000)
>
> I just played Zed, he is SO much better now with these item paths, his WQ IS slightly harder to aim but it's honestly barely noticeable

I started playing zed as soon as I started playing league and rito usually makes the right decisions but right now they screwed this up. AD carries are getting stronger and stronger and they nerf the assassin who has one of the most counterplay (Zhonyas,QSS).How are you suppose to burst down an AD carry with that amount of speed for your q.It is easily dodgeable right now.This patch I can make the case that zed is probably one of the weakest AD assassin and probably the less feared AD mid laner.Played against a zed in lane and he barely made any q's on me because it was so easily dodgeable.Rip zed :( Enjoyed playing you when you were still fun.
can u pls stop he is literally not even that bad...

For what it's worth, I was S5 just yesterday, though I've been dcing a lot as of late since my net has fucked up and has plummeted my MMR.

I was never arguing that Zed was in a good spot, I think he's stronger now than he was before, by a LOT, his itemisation options are excellent. I've only played one Zed game this patch but he is FINE. Playability-wise tjat is. Viability? Probably not very good since there are just too many ways to counter Zed right now. 

Zed does have a lot more over other champions than just a stronger laning phase though, he's a great split pusher and has near unrivalled 1v1 if played correctly. 

He also did see a fair bit of pro play in Season 5 just so you know.

> [{quoted}](name=Jakonatore,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-12T22:04:50.270+0000)
>
> Please, you're bronze 1. The only thing zed had over other champs was a strong laning phase and now he has lost that too. He will never see pro-play again and wouldn't have before the "bug fix" either. Want to know why? Because every other champ does what he does but better.

Im silver V not bronze I lol.
it is supposed to have some counterplay, what was happenign before was a bug and now that riot has fixed it i can stop giving up everytime i see a zed roam into bot

> [{quoted}](name=Armies of Me,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T09:36:23.866+0000)
>
> it is supposed to have some counterplay, what was happenign before was a bug and now that riot has fixed it i can stop giving up everytime i see a zed roam into bot

What is zed suppose to do when he has a slow mo q xD.
It's just sad because the instant wq combo was zed's poke ever since he came out but now they just totally ruined his poke.I don't think i'm gonna play him for now.
its funny the bugs that can make champions, but look at it this way, if yasuo times it right and instantly ulted would u be happy?

> [{quoted}](name=Armies of Me,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T10:06:12.993+0000)
>
> its funny the bugs that can make champions, but look at it this way, if yasuo times it right and instantly ulted would u be happy?

Thats yasuo man unlike zed who ults someone then has to get out of there asap during late game.This is why i'm so affected by the q speed.My last game zed was horrible..I keep forgetting the changes and just ult out knowing that my q would hit their adc bunt unforunately due to the speed of the q I make far way too much miscalculation.

The idea of an assassin that blinks around to avoid taking any hits from a dive is disgusting, especially with the pressure on mid lane mages to stall out laning and trades to regen back mana by hiding under tower and farming passively, due to the mana pot removal.

But Zed isn't dead, trust me he still says byebye to your HP bar as he always had.
i have to agree somewhat but my point is if it has a cast time when he casts it, then no cast time from shaow is a bit broken, the poke may as well have been point and click for the dodge chance

> [{quoted}](name=Armies of Me,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-12T10:08:14.567+0000)
>
> i have to agree somewhat but my point is if it has a cast time when he casts it, then no cast time from shaow is a bit broken, the poke may as well have been point and click for the dodge chance

ik what you're trying to say,I'm just trying to get used to the new changes they did to zed which can be annoying if it slips your mind.Rito made so many changes this patch that I dislike.The new mastery system etc.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-12T10:02:26.158+0000)
>
> The idea of an assassin that blinks around to avoid taking any hits from a dive is disgusting, especially with the pressure on mid lane mages to stall out laning and trades to regen back mana by hiding under tower and farming passively, due to the mana pot removal.
> 
> But Zed isn't dead, trust me he still says byebye to your HP bar as he always had.

I'll give a try and adapt to the new zed.The changes just shocked me and affected my gameplay alot.Zed is a high-skill cap champ and they made him eve more harder by making sure that you have to calcuate the posistion of your q and prediction etc.

So now basically he is gonna lose to all ap mid laners because he has no poke like he has before.His q is always behind his w which slows down the burst potential of zed and also changes his laning phase lots.

I love how people cry underpowered until the pros pick it up.

Zed gets better itemisation = omg why nerf zed?

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=b3Yifd2r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T04:14:26.820+0000)
>
> I love how people cry underpowered until the pros pick it up.
> 
> Zed gets better itemisation = omg why nerf zed?

Go play zed and see his wq combo,really really slow.
